comments.body: nit: Can we add a description: "individual interval fields are non-negative but interval itself can have a sign, and be negative."?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@  - `DateType`: Represents values comprising values of fields year, month and day, without a
  time-zone.
* Interval types
  - `YearMonthIntervalType(startField, endField)`: Represents a year-month interval which is made up of a contiguous subset of the following fields:
    - MONTH, months within years `[0..11]`,
